duck: recitation definition: the act of enumerating.
A recitation in a general sense is the act of reciting from memory, or a formal reading of verse or other writing before an audience.

milestones: Pope appeals for respectful Sundays
Jury acquits three in Politkovskaya murder trial
At least twelve die in Mogadishu attacks

A 'recitation' in a general sense is the act of reciting from memory, or a
formal reading of verse or other writing before an
audience.<ref>[http://www.collinsdictionary.com/dictionary/english/recitation

Unabridged 11th Edition. Retrieved December 07, 2012.</ref> <ref>"Recitation" in
